not_found.title: Faction Not Found
not_found.description: The faction you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

empty_states.no_influence_hint: Edit to define the faction's influence level
empty_states.no_reputation_hint: Edit to define the faction's public reputation

faction.title: Delete Faction
faction.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{entityName}}"?
faction.message_with_versions: This will permanently delete "{{entityName}}" and all {{totalVersions}} versions.

version.title: Delete Version
version.message: Are you sure you want to delete the version "{{versionName}}"?

versions.title: Versions

empty_state.title: Only the main version exists
empty_state.description: Create alternative versions to explore different faction states

hint.title: ðŸ’¡ Tip:
hint.description: Create versions to explore different faction states: pre-reform, after collapse, alternative version, etc. Each version maintains independent data!

create_dialog.title: Create New Version
create_dialog.info_message: First, define the version name and description. Then you can customize the faction data.
create_dialog.name_placeholder: E.g.: Original Version, After Reform, In Decline...
create_dialog.description_placeholder: Describe the differences in this version...

versions.coming_soon: Version management will be available soon.

validation.name_max_length: Name must be at most 200 characters
validation.summary_max_length: Summary must be at most 500 characters
validation.government_form_max_length: Government form must be at most 500 characters
validation.economy_max_length: Economy must be at most 500 characters
validation.symbols_and_secrets_max_length: Symbols and secrets must be at most 500 characters
validation.external_influence_max_length: External influence must be at most 500 characters
validation.faction_motto_max_length: Motto must be at most 300 characters
validation.uniform_and_aesthetics_max_length: Uniform and aesthetics must be at most 500 characters
validation.foundation_date_max_length: Foundation date must be at most 200 characters
validation.foundation_history_summary_max_length: Foundation history must be at most 500 characters
validation.organization_objectives_max_length: Objectives must be at most 500 characters
validation.narrative_importance_max_length: Narrative importance must be at most 500 characters
validation.inspirations_max_length: Inspirations must be at most 500 characters

diplomacy.title: Diplomacy
diplomacy.no_factions_message: Create other factions to establish diplomatic relationships.
diplomacy.cannot_self_relate: Cannot create relationship with the same faction
diplomacy.duplicate_relation: A relationship with this faction already exists

empty_state.title: No diplomatic relationships
empty_state.description: Add relationships to define this faction's relations with others.

diplomatic_status.subordinate_desc: Factions under the influence or control of this faction
diplomatic_status.war_desc: In active conflict and open hostilities
diplomatic_status.neutral_desc: No defined relationship or neutral position

hierarchy.title: Hierarchy
hierarchy.add_title_description: Add a new title to the hierarchy.
hierarchy.order_hint: The lower the number, the higher the importance in the hierarchy (1-100).
hierarchy.add_member_description: Select a character and assign a title.
hierarchy.select_title_description: Choose the title for this member in the hierarchy.
hierarchy.select_character_description: Select the character you want to add to the hierarchy.
hierarchy.no_characters_message: Create characters to add them to the faction's hierarchy.
hierarchy.no_titles_hint: Create titles first to add members.
hierarchy.no_titles_available: No titles available. Create titles first using the 'Manage Titles' button.
hierarchy.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this title?

empty_state.title: No members in hierarchy
empty_state.description: Add members to organize the faction's hierarchical structure.

chronology.title: Chronology
chronology.add_event_description: Add a new event to the faction's timeline.
chronology.event_title_placeholder: E.g.: Foundation, Battle of..., Rise of...
chronology.event_description_placeholder: Describe what happened in this event...
chronology.drag_hint: Drag events to rearrange the timeline order.

empty_state.title: No events in the chronology
empty_state.description: Add events to document the faction's chronological history.

timeline.title: Timeline

empty_state.title: No Timeline Defined
empty_state.description: This faction does not have a historical timeline defined yet.
empty_state.description_edit: Create the first era to start documenting this faction's history.

timeline.new_era_description: Create a new era in the timeline.
timeline.era_description_placeholder: A time of darkness and discovery, where the first civilizations began to rise from the ashes of chaos
timeline.era_no_events: This era has no events yet
timeline.new_event_description: Add a new event to the timeline.
timeline.description_placeholder: During three nights, the sky turned red and the five moons of the planet aligned for the first time in a thousand years. Portals opened bringing creatures from other planes
timeline.reason_placeholder: The forbidden ritual performed by the mages of the Gray Council broke the veil between the planes
timeline.outcome_placeholder: The heroes managed to close the portals, but not before half of the city was destroyed
timeline.event_name_era_required: Event name and era are required
